com.ca.svcode.agent

Class HijackTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ca.svcode.agent.HijackTransformer

  • public class HijackTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    Our transforming implementation class which is stored in AgentTransformer.hijackTransformers.

        public java.lang.Class<?> getTransformedClass()

        Class finder.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        AgentException - If class is not loaded in class loader.

      • transform

        public byte[] transform(byte[] classData)
        This method provides generating a new code, which is inserted in order to HijackMode. In generated code is initialized HijackContext, which should contains reference of object, which is instrumented. Note that it could be null if instrumented method is static. This is decided by Modifier.isStatic(int) and CtBehavior.getModifiers().
        Parameters:
        classData - original class data.
        Returns:
        transformed class data.

      • disable

        Helper method for disabling this hijack transformer.

        Helper method for enabling this hijack transformer.
